content: crocheted place/table mat in drops belle the piece is worked in the round middle outwards with treble crochets and fan-pattern theme christmas #snowflakelacedoily pattern vs-127 yarn group b **size** approx 39 cm in diameter **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 24 sand **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm
